Reading, the first record in the ARC -- the ARC metadata -- is just like 
any other record; its not given any special treatment.  Its always the 
first record in the ARC so you know how to find it.  Rig an XML parser 
and feed it the first record body to find the description/operator elements.

St.Ack

acidbluebriggs wrote:
>
> I've been looking through the javadocs but I can't find what I am
> looking for. Is there a mechanism that allows me access to the
> "arcmetadata" of the archive file itself? Like the
> description/operator fields? I've tucked some of my own metadata
> within these fields and need to extract them while parsing the records.
>
> Thanks!
>
> Briggs
